entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Fort Providence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 a.m. MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:23 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
